General.Name: Zhejiang Realsun Chemical Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Realsun Chemical Co.,Ltd. manufactures pharmaceutical intermediates and other chemical products in China, the United States, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and other regions. It also engages in research and development, production and sales of ABL, E2, CPMK, GBL, HDO, and IPA, as well as the trades in chemical products. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Linhai, China. Zhejiang Realsun Chemical Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Liansheng Chemical Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No.9 Donghai Third Avenue, Linhai, China, 317016
